abstract: Justice Dept says it will investigate fatal police shooting in South Carolina of Zachary Hammond, teenager killed during attempted drug arrest.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Justice said Wednesday night that it would investigate the shooting death of a teenager killed during an attempted drug arrest.

headline.main: South Carolina: Justice Department Joins Inquiry Into Killing by Officer
headline.print_headline: South Carolina: Justice Department Joins Inquiry Into Killing by Officer

snippet: The Department of Justice said Wednesday night that it would investigate the shooting death of a teenager killed during an attempted drug arrest.
